Package app.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    State
    The State interface defines the contract for different states within the application.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateState
    The CreateState class handles user interactions for creating and removing playlists, as well as navigating to playlist view or play states.
    EditPlaylistState
    The EditPlaylistState class allows users to add or remove songs from a specified playlist.
    MainMenuState
    MainMenuState handles the main menu interaction of the MusicSimulator application.
    PlayQueueState
    PlayQueueState manages the playback of songs in the queue, allowing the user to play, shuffle, navigate between songs, and add more songs.
    SaveState
    SaveState allows the user to save the current state of the music library and playlists to a specified file location.
    SearchState
    The SearchState class allows users to search for artists and view their songs.
    ShowPlaylistsState
    ShowPlaylistsState displays all available playlists and provides options for users to view or play specific playlists, or return to the main menu.
    ShowSongState
    ShowSongState displays the list of songs available in the library and allows the user to perform actions such as adding new songs, playing songs, and managing the queue.
    ViewPlaylistState
    The ViewPlaylistState class represents the state where the user can view a specific playlist, play it, add songs to it, or return to the playlist menu.
